name: TRIO (itch)
description:
Trio is a 1Dimentional 2-Player game of competition.

Drop 3 corners to form a triangle and capture the other player inside! Be careful of the blue ball and its randomly generated triangles as well.

PLAYER 1 KEYS:

WASD - Movement

G - Drop Corner

PLAYER 2 KEYS:

Arrow Keys - Movement

L - Drop Corner
